display_long_description:
#Create Music Like Never Before in VR/MR

Step into a revolutionary music-making experience in virtual and mixed reality.

- **Seamless Immersion**: Full hand-tracking support and mixed reality passthrough bring your studio to life.
- **Perfect Loops, Effortlessly**: Sync loops from a rich content library automatically time-stretched and pitch-shifted to match your song.
- **Sing & Perform**: Record vocals with motion-captured avatar playback—your virtual self, center stage.
- **Be You**: Rock your custom Ready Player Me avatar.
- **Beat It**: Explore a dynamic set of drum kits and one-shots.
- **Mix Masterfully**: Use Decks to craft flawless transitions and seamless mixes.
- **Sound Sculpting**: Apply pro-grade audio FX (reverb, chorus, and more) to individual clips or entire scenes.
- **Automation Magic**: Loop-record automation for FX and synth parameters with precision.
- **3D Control**: Assign and tweak FX and synth settings in a fully spatial environment.
- **Visual Vibes**: Sync looping videos to the beat for a multisensory experience.
- **Step It Up**: Trigger anything in your world with a step sequencer—loop instruments, drum kits, and edit steps with swing quantization.
- **Synth Powerhouse**: Built-in Analog and Wavetable synths with over 250 inspiring sounds.
- **Binaural Bliss**: Craft immersive spatial mixes based on clip positioning.
- **Capture the Moment**: Record In-game camera to showcase your creativity.
- ""Your Gear, Your Way"": Plug in your USB MIDI keyboard or controller for ultimate control.
